products.title: VFC Carl Gustaf USSOCOM M3 MAAWS Gas-Powered Gel Blaster Rocket / Grenade Launcher
products.body_html:
Available on 19th December 2025, Launch price until end of the year

Features

  • Utilizes nylon fiber-reinforced polymer for the main structure, which greatly reduces the weight of the whole product. This provides a weight reduction from what would be 10 kg (if manufactured using original material) to about 4 kg with the VFC design
  • Internally, all key components are still made from metal so durability is retained where it matters most!
  • The first gel blaster  "bazooka" made by VFC
  • Realistic loading and firing operations help keep immersion at max
  • Built to externally replicate the real M3 as closely as possible with details like dummy rifling, realistic adjustable iron sights, and a realistic "venturi locking device" to seal the breach
  • Includes a simulated 84mm dummy rocket with the ability to add firing functionality
  • Install a standard 40mm gas grenade by removing the dummy rocket cap on the 84mm rocket, allowing you to fire gel balls or rubber caps!
  • Comes with a standard green gas-powered firing system
  • MIL-STD 1913 Picatinny rail for adding optics, lasers, or other accessories
  • Compatible with double bell gas grenade (not include)

The Modern "Bazooka" of the US Special OperationsIn service around the world, the Carl Gustav recoilless rifle has also been continuously developed for new uses, including with the US special operations forces and the British SAS as a tool to deal with bunkers and combat vehicles. In November 2011, the U.S. Army ordered the M3 series for regular troops on the battlefield in Afghanistan to fight against RPG rocket launchers equipped by opposing forces. The effective range of the RPG rocket launcher is 500-600 meters. Compared with the M3 Carl Gustaf, with the combination of different ammunition types, the effective range can be increased to about 1300 meters. And as an added feature set through the use of proper munitions, it also has the ability of air bombing enemies hiding in bunkers from directly above.

On March 28, 2013, U.S. Special Operations Command (USSOCOM) asked the manufacturer to reduce weight but gave strict instructions that the reduction in weight and size should not affect the weapon's center of gravity or durability. Saab Bofors Dynamics had also already developed a weight-reduced version prior to delivery to USSOCOM that had been shown in firing tests to have no performance degradation, no recoil increase, and barrel life essentially the same as the unmodified version.

products.title: Maple Leaf MLC-LTR Lightweight Tactical Gel Blaster Sniper Rifle OD
products.body_html:
Available on 19th December 2025, Launch price until end of the year

Features

  • High strength reinforced fiber polymer construction
  • Super lightweight design
  • Reliable spring power sniper rifle
  • Ambidextrous sockets at the front and rear for QD sling mounts
  • Aluminum alloy side M-LOK interface
  • Built-in Picatinny stock base allows interchangeable fixed and folding stocks
  • Picatinny under rail for grips, lights, lasers and more
  • Compatible with gas blowback Airsoft AR-15/M4 grips
  • Full CNC internal
  • Come with WAT precision hop-up barrel 

Manufacturer: Maple Leaf

Maple Leaf is widely recognised for its exceptional precision sniper upgrade components, designed for players who demand maximum accuracy, consistency, and long-range performance. Their sniper-focused products are engineered with meticulous attention to detail, making them a top choice for high-powered, precision-driven builds.

Maple Leaf’s sniper series features advanced hop system designs, precision inner barrels hop up that deliver stable trajectory, enhanced backspin control, and tight shot groupings at extended distances. These upgrades are especially valued in sniper-style gel blasters where accuracy and consistency matter more than raw rate of fire.

Trusted by experienced marksmen and performance-focused builders, Maple Leaf sniper components are ideal for players looking to push the limits of long-range precision and reliability in their gel blaster setups.

From casual players to serious competitors, Maple Leaf has built a strong reputation for innovation, quality control, and real-world performance. Their products are extensively tested and continuously refined to meet the demands of modern gel blaster platforms.

At WAT International, we stock genuine Maple Leaf upgrade parts suitable for gel blaster use, helping Australian players get the most out of their builds.

products.title: King Arms Full-Auto M2 Carbine Gas Blowback Gel Blaster Replica
products.body_html:
Available on 19th December 2025, Launch price until end of the year

Features

  • Heavy duty aluminum alloy barrel and trigger assembly
  • Real wood stock
  • Realistic gas blowback action to simulate the bolt cycling action & recoil
  • 35 round style green gas magazine
  • Built-in front & rear sling attachment points
  • Fixed front and adjustable rear sights
  • Wing protected front post sight
  • Select-fire capability, can be used in full-auto or semi-auto

The King Arms M1 Carbine replica is a beautiful reproduction of this classic firearm. Made with real wood and aluminum alloy, the rifle looks and feels authentic. Adding to the realism is a Co2/Green Gas powered gas recoil system which helps to imitate the bolt cycling action.

Although the M1 Carbine was famously known for it's capability, few know that originally the Carbine was meant to be select-fire capable, however during World War 2 it was easier to produce semi-auto M1s at the time. Towards the end the M2 was introduced, with a bayonet lug, and the select-fire capability added afterwards. During the Korean conflict, the M2 carbine saw more wider use and an experimental 30-round magazine was also issued along with it.

Specifications:

Length: 920mm
Weight: 2450g
Magazine Capacity: 25-30rds
Fire Modes: Semi-Auto, Full Auto, Safe
Package Includes: Gun, Magazine

About King Arms

King Arms was founded in 2004 with the mission to ensure optimum customer satisfaction by providing precision products and outstanding service. In 2015, we moved our headquarters from Hong Kong to Taiwan where we've continued to provide excellent products with the highest quality. While working with leading firearms manufactures, we provide to our customers a level of innovation and authenticity that can't be found anywhere else in the Airsoft and Gelsoft industry. This goal is what continuously drives us to improve and gives us purpose.

products.title: Quantum Mechanics OWB Condition 3 Carry Quick Tactical Holster
products.body_html:
*Gun, magazines, & ammunition shown in images not includedWhether your preferred method of handgun carry is concealed or open, a quality holster that fits your preferred method, lifestyle, and carry condition is a must. In carrying a weapon, firearm conditions are a primary way to declare the readiness of the weapon.

Condition Zero (0) refers to magazine inserted, round in the chamber, hammer cocked, and safety off. This method of carry is arguably the quickest to present and discharge your weapon as it does not require any fine motor skills to manipulate slides or safeties on the weapon. The drawback of this carry condition is the concern for safety as the weapon is ready at any given moment, which increases the chance of a potential negligent discharge in a gross motor skill situation.

Condition One (1) refers to magazine inserted, round in chamber, hammer cocked, and safety on. This method of carry is often referred to Cocked & Locked. The advantage of this carry method is that presentation of the firearm is just as quick as condition zero, but requires the fine motor skill of disengaging the safety before the weapon can be discharged. The extra step to ready the firearm at the draw reduces the chance of a negligent discharge.

Condition Two (2) refers to magazine inserted, round in chamber, hammer uncocked. This method of carry is popular with weapons that feature a double action / single action trigger. The long double action pull for the first shot means the user has to deliberately pull the trigger to fire the weapon. In a sense, this carry condition allows presentation of the weapon similar to Condition Zero, however the user must be accustomed to transitioning from a long double action pull to a single action pull.

Condition Three (3) refers to magazine inserted, empty chamber, hammer uncocked. This carry method is often referred to as Israeli Carry. The idea behind this method of carry is that it is inherently the safest as you will need to manipulate the slide to chamber a round before the weapon may be discharged. The drawback of this method of carry is the amount of time it takes to ready and present the weapon.

Condition Four (4) refers to a completely unloaded weapon. This carry condition is usually only used when holstered at a public range that allows holster carry, or at a firearms class before being instructed to load the weapon.

For some, not all carry conditions are available either due to agency policy, local laws, weapon configuration, or just user preference. The Quantum Mechanics holster was specifically designed to fill a specific role and re-acquire some of the weapon presentation speed that is lost when running a weapon in Condition Three without sacrificing any of the safety. The unique design of the holster allows the weapon to be released and have a round chambered with quick fluid motion using just one hand. To use this unique holster, the weapon retention button is pressed to release the weapon and allow the holster to swing out. The next movement is to push the weapon down into the holster itself which will cycle the slide and chamber a round. Lastly the weapon can then be lifted out of the holster and presented for immediate use. To reholster your weapon, simply clear your weapon to put it back into condition three; the holster is magnetized with a guide slot for your front sight for easy and quick indexing of your weapon before locking back in place.
Other key features of this holster system is its open bottom design allowing the use of any lights and lasers without modification or adjustment to the weapon or holster.

*Disclaimer* The Quantum Mechanics holster is only meant for Condition Three (3) carry. It is not intended to be used with Conditions Zero (0), Condition One (1), Condition Two (2).

Features:

  • Heavy duty injection molded polymer construction
  • Ultra light weight and comfortable to wear
  • Locking active retention system
  • Front sight guide slot and magnets assist re-indexing of slide for quick reholstering
  • Spring loaded design allows holster to quickly swing open once retention lock is disengaged for rapid access
  • Uniquely designed to allow for quick one hand manipulation to chamber a round; ideal for agencies that require condition 3 carry
  • Safely carry in condition 3 without sacrificing a speedy presentation of your weapon
  • Adjustable belt loop system accommodates belts of various sizes
  • Adjustable cant angle
  • Adjustable holster height

Orientation: Right Hand Draw
Firearm Compatibility: Glock 17, Glock 22
Material: High Strength Injection Molded Polymer

Manufacturer: Quantum Mechanics

products.title: Monk CSG CNC HPA Gearbox Shell
products.body_html:
The Monk CSG CNC HPA Gearbox Shell is a premium-grade upgrade designed for high-performance HPA gel blaster builds. Precision-machined from CNC aluminium, this gearbox shell delivers exceptional strength, accuracy, and durability under high air pressure and competitive play.

Built specifically for HPA (High Pressure Air) systems, the Monk CSG shell offers superior internal alignment, reinforced stress points, and smooth airflow routing for consistent shot performance. Its rigid CNC construction eliminates flex found in standard cast gearboxes, making it ideal for speedsoft, CQB, and tournament-level gel blasters.

Compatible with popular HPA engines and custom builds, the Monk CSG CNC gearbox shell is the go-to choice for players seeking maximum reliability, precision, and longevity in their gel blaster setup.

Key Features:

  • CNC-machined aluminium HPA gearbox shell

  • Designed for HPA gel blaster systems

  • Reinforced structure for high-pressure durability

  • Ideal for competitive, speedsoft & custom builds

The CGS HELIOS Ti Full Metal Gel Blaster Suppressor Replica is a premium cosmetic attachment designed to elevate the look of your gel blaster setup. Made from durable full-metal construction with 14 mm CCW thread, it delivers a tactical, aggressive aesthetic inspired by real-steel designs.

This is a non-functional gel blaster accessory — it does NOT reduce sound or act as a real suppressor.

Perfect for upgrading rifle builds, enhancing display pieces, or completing a mil-sim loadout.

products.title: CGS/T8 EMG Daniel Defense Licensed DDM4 MK18 RIII 10.5 Inch MWS GBBR Gel Blaster-Silver (Steel Internal Parts)
products.body_html:
Features

  • Officially licensed replica of the cutting edge Daniel Defense MK18 RIII line
  • Ultra durable full metal construction with engraved Daniel Defense markings on the upper and lower receiver
  • Brand new CGS/T8 system provides reliable performance and durability
  • Cross-compatible with most standard Tokyo Marui MWS-spec parts
  • Short 10.5" outer barrel is ideal for anything from CQB to mid-range engagements
  • Daniel Defense-licensed RIS III handguard with full-length 1913 Picatinny top rail
  • M-LOK mounting slots at the 3, 6, and 9 o'clock sides to reduce overall weight, improve comfort when holding, and increase modularity
  • Licensed Daniel Defense overmolded pistol grip with aggressive texture for improved manipulation
  • EMG "ETA" collapsible buttstock with rubber grip texture on cheek rests and quick-removable butt pad to access battery compartment
  • Ambidextrous charging handle for right- or left-handed use
  • 30 round CGS gel blaster MWS STANAG magazine included
  • Come with steel constructed fire control group MWS SP system trigger box
  • Adjustable hammer & trigger
  • Full Steel high performance SP system T8 bolt carrier and nozzle set
  • Start-up pressure only 4kg good for using in the winter.
  • CNC recoil buffer and strong recoil
  • Come with Hop-up barrel

Daniel Defense's MK18 RIII is an upgraded version of the popular MK18 platform, offering less weight and greater flexibility. This short-barreled rifle is outfitted with the exclusive RIS III rail system, an optimized version of the renowned RIS II rail that was developed by SOCOM. The RIS III rail system is lighter than the RIS II but still provides extreme durability, and multiple M-LOK attachment points allow for the installation of tactical lights/lasers, vertical grips, and other M-LOK-compatible accessories.

Introducing the EMG Daniel Defense DD MK18 RIII gel blaster GBB Rifle. This rifle is fully licensed by EMG, featuring authentic Daniel Defense markings for a true-to-life replica. Equipped with a Daniel Defense-licensed RIS III handguard, it provides a solid and reliable platform for customization. The M-LOK mounting slots offer versatility in attaching accessories to enhance your gameplay. Designed with attention to detail, this rifle also includes a Daniel Defense stock and pistol grip, providing ergonomic comfort and control during intense battles. The rifle comes with a Licensed Lancer Systems Gas Magazine, ensuring you have enough ammunition to stay in the action. As part of the CGS/T8 gas blowback Platinum Series GBBRS, it guarantees exceptional performance and reliability on the field.

products.body_html:
Upgrade your gel blaster’s profile with the OPS Style 3rd Model Suppressor Replica (Non-QD) —  full-metal suppressor accessory engineered for realism and a secure mechanical fit. Instead of a quick-detach interface, this suppressor uses a locking clamp system that fastens around your outer barrel (must be 19mm OD) to deliver consistent alignment and a professional, solid appearance.

Built for players, builders and collectors who prioritise authenticity and repeatable mounting, the OPS 3rd Model replica features a matte tactical finish, durable metal construction, and a locking mechanism that prevents wobble when fitted correctly to a 19mm outer barrel. This replica is ideal for styling pistols, carbines and PDW rigs for CQB, display, cosplay or photo/video use.

Important: This is a non-QD suppressor replica that requires an outer barrel with a 19mm outside diameter (OD). Confirm your outer barrel measurement before purchase. The mounting is mechanical — no special tools are required for basic installation, but torque and fit should be checked to avoid damage to thin or non-standard barrels.

Key Features

  • Full-metal alloy construction for realistic looking and durability

  • Non-QD locking clamp mounting — secures to 19mm outer barrel OD

  • Matte black tactical finish — low glare, pro look

  • Perfect for Black Hawk Down Gordon XM177 Rifle and M4A1 Set Up

  • Designed as a replica for gel blaster and display use

  • AU stocked — local shipping and support

  • Material: Full metal body (aluminium main body, steel clamp hardware)

  • Mount Type: Non-QD locking clamp — locks outer barrel (requires 19.0 mm OD)

  • Overall Length: 250 mm

  • Outer Diameter: 40 mm

  • Clamp ID Requirement: 19.0 mm outer barrel OD

  • Weight: 180 g (full metal)

Fitment & Installation Notes

  • Measure your outer barrel OD— the clamp is engineered for 19.0 mm. 

  • If your outer barrel is slightly under/over, the clamp may not hold securely or may need shimming — check fit before finalising installation.

  • Not designed for live-fire or sound suppression — replica only.

products.title: Aztech CNC Range Warrior Barrel Fit Hop Up
products.body_html:
Discover the pinnacle of gel blaster performance with Aztech Innovations' Range Warrior Hopup. This cutting-edge hopup leverages the renowned and highly efficient Muzzletek internal design, now reimagined in a sleek, barrel-mounted form factor. Engineered to fit all gel blasters equipped with metal inner barrels, the Range Warrior sets a new standard in precision and compatibility.

Constructed from precision-machined CNC aluminium, its outer casing delivers unmatched strength and durability, ensuring a secure, tight fit. The unique, proprietary multi-claw barrel mounting system guarantees a perfectly centered, stable installation without rotation or movement, slim enough to be concealed within a suppressor cover if desired. For an optimal fit, minor sanding of your outer barrel's exterior may be necessary.

Aztech offers two distinct designs: a straightforward, non-ported option and a visually striking, CNC-ported variant for enhanced aesthetics and finish.

The internal hop unit, made from high-quality injection-moulded ABS, mirrors the innovative design of the acclaimed Muzzletek hopup, with the Range Warrior introducing a completely tool-less, manual adjustment feature. This hopup is universally compatible with all metal inner barrels boasting outer diameters between 9mm and 9.7mm, making it a versatile choice for enthusiasts.

This hopup is a game-changer in the world of gel blasters, designed to significantly increase the range and accuracy of your M4 and AK variant rifles. Proudly designed, manufactured, and assembled in Australia, the Range Warrior Hopup embodies local craftsmanship and quality.

  • Hopup Material: Injection-moulded ABS

  • Compatibility: Metal inner barrels 9-9.7mm

products.title: LDT ETU V2 Lite Optical MOSFET (Rear Wire) — Smart. Durable. Reliable.
products.body_html:
Built for performance and durability, the LDT ETU V2 Lite MOSFET delivers next-level electronic control for gel blasters — combining precision engineering, intelligent learning, and multi-layer protection in one compact system.

 Intelligent Battery Protection

Automatically detects battery voltage and enters a low-power smart protection mode.

Even if you forget to unplug the battery, it won’t be damaged.

 Intelligent Adaptive Learning

Automatically recognizes brushed and brushless motors as well as various gear ratios.

Adjusts braking force in real time to ensure smooth cycling and consistent performance.

 Simple & Fast Programming

User-friendly operation and instant programming — supports dual-burst, multi-burst, pre-cocking time adjustment, and more advanced firing options.

 Precision Craftsmanship & Premium Materials

  • Double-layer waterproof coating for reliable performance in all conditions.
  • 4-layer PCB with thick copper conductors — improves conductivity and heat dissipation by more than 100%.
  • Teflon wiring — low resistance, high durability, and abrasion resistance.
  • Equipped with XT30 connector — strong, heat-resistant, and built for long-term reliability.

 High-Precision Optical Sensor

Performs tens of thousands of optical detections per second for precise cycling and gear recognition.

Uses non-contact optical sensing, ensuring no mechanical wear and ultra-long lifespan.

 Quick & Easy Installation

No magnets, no stickers — simply drop it in and go.

Compatible with most Version 2 gearboxes, ideal for beginners and advanced users alike.

 Multi-Layer Protection System

Enhanced circuit protection featuring:

  • Over-current, over-temperature, and under-voltage safeguards
  • Brushless motor protection
  • Smart battery protection
  • Peace of mind with every trigger pull

 Oil-Resistant Optical Control

High-precision sensor combined with SMART SENSE algorithm ensures reliable operation even when gears or triggers are oily.

Keeps performance accurate and prevents false triggers in all conditions.

 

LDT ETU V2 Lite Troubleshooting Guide

Beep Pattern

LED Indicator

Device Behaviour

Possible Cause & Recommended Solution

2 Beeps

 Flashes Blue Twice

Motor does not rotate; repeats each trigger pull

Low battery voltage. Replace or recharge your battery.

3 Beeps

 Flashes Blue Three Times

Motor fails to rotate; light and buzzer repeat every 5 cycles

Mainboard overheating. Allow the unit to cool down before use.

5 Beeps

 Flashes Blue Five Times

Motor turns briefly (0.5s), then light and buzzer repeat 5 times

Gear detection issue. Gears may be jammed or the motor installed incorrectly. Reinstall and ensure smooth gear rotation.

1 Beeps 

 Flashes Blue Once

Motor runs normally but suddenly stops

Circuit protection triggered. Short circuit detected in the battery, wiring, or spring contact. Disconnect the battery, fix the short, and retry.

No Beep

 Blue Light Flashes Continuously

Motor does not rotate

Main power short-circuit protection. Disconnect the battery immediately, inspect wiring, and test again.

No Beep

 Flashes Blue Five Times

Motor does not rotate; LED cycles 5 times

Motor not connected or motor damaged. Check all connectors, wiring, and motor condition before retrying.

 

LDT ETU V2 LITE — Programming Setup Guide

Single / Burst Programming 

(Keep the small SAFE / SEMI / AUTO labels and the “5s” icon the same positions as the original.)

  1. Move the selector to the middle SEMI position.
  2. Hold the trigger for 5 seconds until you hear one beep to enter burst programming.
  • Press 1× → 1 beep — Single shot
  • Press 2× → 2 beeps — 2-round burst
  • Press 3× → 3 beeps — 3-round burst
  • Press 4× → 4 beeps — 4-round burst
  • Press 5× → 5 beeps — 5-round burst

Mag Prime Programming

(Keep the SAFE / SEMI / AUTO labels and the “8s” icon in the same positions as the original.)

  1. Move the selector to the middle SEMI position.
  2. Hold the trigger for 8 seconds until you hear two beeps to enter pre-cocking programming.
  • Press 1× — Level 1
  • Press 2× — Level 2
  • Press 3× — Level 3
  • Press 4× — Level 4

We recommend having our technicians to install mosfet, as any damage to the mosfet during unauthorized installation will void the warranty.

products.title: Puff Dino 12kg Super Gas for Gel Blasters
products.body_html:
Specifications

PUFF DINO Green Gas for gel blasters is manufactured by the leader manufacturer of aerosol products in Taiwan. PUFF DINO gas is from an ISO 9001 certificated production line, so it can keeps in a stable high quality.
We add suitable silicone oil to aid smoothness and power of every shot.

SPECIAL FEATURES

  • Our product is using high power quality gas that perfectly mixed with silicon to improve your gun performance.
  • Silicon mixed will protect your gun; lubricant parts while you are shooting and upgrade every shooting experience you have.
  • The reason why we added silicon is due to liquefied gas will causing instant frozen effect right after leave the pressurized cylinder and making plastic/rubber parts hardened and brittle.
  • With our high-quality silicone added, it will help to prevent parts accelerate aging. Therefore enhances maintenance and smoothness in shooting.
  • This will also save you from time-consuming process like separating internal parts to lubricating them individually.
  • The metal nuzzle design will increase the life of usage and prevent leakage of green gas. By using green gas, our product is eco-friendly and harmless to the environment.

HOW TO USE

  • Hold the green gas cylinder upside down and press the cylinder nozzle straight down into the magazine valve.
  • Once you see the green gas leak out from magazine valve; it means there are enough gas filled and stop filling immediately.
  • The gas pressure would differ by the temperature.

SPECIFICATION

  • Volume: 600 ml
  • Product Size: 6.5 cm x 6.5 cm x 29.0 cm
  • Ingredient : C3H8, Silicone Oil.

HEL E4A Gel Blasters Suppressor Replica for M16-Series
products.body_html:
Originally developed during the late stages of the Vietnam War era, the real HEL E4A was one of the early military-issued rifle suppressors.

It was designed to reduce muzzle flash and report on 5.56×45 mm rifles, allowing special units to operate with improved stealth in dense jungle and night-time operations.

 Historic Background:

  • The HEL E4A suppressor was field-tested by elements of the U.S. Army Special Forces (Green Berets), MACV-SOG teams, and some SEAL detachments during the Vietnam conflict.
  • It was primarily paired with early-pattern M16 and CAR-15/XM177-type rifles, as well as occasionally with starlight-scope-equipped marksman rifles for ambush and reconnaissance missions.
  • Although later replaced by more modern designs such as the XM-style and OPS/SSS suppressors, the E4A represents one of the pioneering steps in practical military rifle suppression.

Product Features:

  • Durable Alloy Construction: Provides a solid, long-lasting build ideal for field use with gel blasters.
  • Easy Installation: Compatible with standard M16-series gel blaster outer barrels (14 mm CCW thread).
  • Lightweight Design: Adds historical style without affecting your blaster’s balance.
  • For Display or Gameplay: A must-have accessory for collectors, historical reenactors, or players who want their M16-style gel blaster to stand out.

This is a non-functional, replica suppressor intended solely for gel blasters, display, cosplay, and lawful recreational use. It is not suitable for real firearms.

products.title: A&K Full Size M1 Garand Gel Blaster AEG with Real Wood Furniture
products.body_html:
Features

  • Full size replica of the trusted M1 Garand battle rifle w/ beautifully stained real wood furniture
  • Metal receiver and barrel assembly
  • Adjustable rear sight
  • Front and rear sling rings; Stacking swivel
  • Version 7 gearbox
  • Functioning trigger guard safety
  • Drop free magazine feeds from the bottom of the rifle; Low profile magazine release on the left side of the receiver maintains traditional M1 styling

The first standard issue semi-automatic rifle issued to the US Armed Forces, the M1 Garand was referred to as "the greatest battle implement ever devised" by General George S. Patton. Replacing the venerable Springfield M1903 in 1936, the M1 Garand quickly displayed its huge advantage on the battlefield. During World War II, the M1 Garand saw extensive use and gave US forces a major advantage in firefights against Axis soldiers who were usually issued slower bolt-action rifles. The M1 Garand remained in service throughout the Korean War and even had limited deployment in the early years of the Vietnam War. The rifle still continues to be used even in the modern day by drill teams and military honor guards as well as in the civilian market long after it was retired from active service.

A&K has faithfully reproduced the venerable M1 Garand in an AEG that everyone can afford. Striving to offer the most realism and reliability for your dollar, the A&K M1 Garand features a stained wood stock and a metal alloy receiver and barrel assembly giving this M1 a realistic look and feel that will have you believing you are pushing through the hedgerows in the south of France. Internally the A&K M1 Garand is powered by a version 7 gearbox allowing a level of customization and upgradeability not found in other M1 AEG replicas on the market. While all the major features of a good M1 Garand replica are there, A&K did not skimp on the details including a period correct safety, bayonet lug, sling rings stacking swivel and an authentic sight picture. Whether you are a WWII re-enactor or an gel blaster player looking to field a unique rifle, the A&K M1 Garand delivers on looks, performance, realism and usability that puts it at the front of the pack.

  • Licensed Colt MK18 Mod 1 replica with deep engraved trademarks
  • Brand new CGS/T8 system provides reliable performance and durability
  • Cross-compatible with most standard Tokyo Marui MWS-spec parts

The Mk18 rifle is probably one of the most Popular Modern rifles to date, Having its origins in the US Army as a CQB / Mid-range capable rifle. The CQBR, designated Mk 18 Mod 0, is a variant of the M4 family of carbines. Designed for Close Quarters Battle (CQB), the CQBR is significantly shorter than its M4 / M4A1 cousins, with a barrel length of 10.5 inches compared to the M4's 14.5 inches. The Mk 18 rifle is also adopted by some of the major US special forces units and has been used by basically every unit in SOCOM. The Mk18 is also vastly popular in video games like Call Of Duty and movies like the award-winning Zero Dark Thirty.

CGS/T8 has been making waves with its line of accessories for the Tokyo Marui MWS and its new line of pre-upgraded gel blaster M4 gas blowback rifles. The fully licensed Cybergun Colt MK18 Mod 1 GBB gel blaster rifle is one of CGS/T8's premier gel blaster GBBR M4 to hit the market. The Cybergun Colt MK18 Mod 1 GBB gel blaster rifle is a robust well-made replica with its slick 10.5 metal DD style Picatinny rail that allows you to mount attachments like optics, laser modules, flashlights, grips, and any other Picatinny attachments.

Internally, the Cybergun Colt MK18 Mod 1 GBB gel blaster rifle has CGS/T8's Trigger box and bolt set, Which is an upgraded version of the venerable Tokyo Marui MWS system. This trigger box and bolt set are packed full of features. The difference between the CGS trigger box and the standard MWS trigger box is that the CGS set does not use the ZET plate. Instead, CGS has opted for a more realistic style bolt locking system. Both the bolt and the trigger box are made of steel, this gives this MK18 a heavy recoil feeling when shooting which packs a punch with every shot. Also, the trigger box boasts an adjustable trigger so you can truly fine-tune it in accordance to your shooting style, making each Cybergun MK18 unique to its user.

products.body_html:
The Multi-Angle Pistol Grip (MAPG) gives you a custom adjustment for your specific shooting comfort, needs or mission. The MAPG has an adjustment range from 10 to 35 degrees offering a low angle for that PDW setup or modern shooting positions. Maximize the ergonomics of your AR GBBR if you shoot elbows in. For those whose style is to shoot elbows out, we have the high angles to match or go beyond the traditional A2 grip angle. It has got you covered with this adjustable grip. To adjust the angle of the grip, its quick and easy without even removing this pistol grip from the lower receiver. Simply remove the rubber grip plug and use the included hex tool to turn to your desired angle. The MAPG includes the Pistol Grip Plug Tool Holder Insert so you can store the hex tool as well as other tools that fit or a CR2032 battery (not waterproof) in an organized storage compartment.

NOTE: Multi-Angle Pistol Grip must be set at 35-degree to install pistol grip screw and crush washer.

products.title: COLT XM177E2 MACVSOG RIFLE ATM EBBR Gel Blaster Replica
products.body_html:
The CAR-15 XM177 or CAR-15 Commando was a part of the CAR-15 Military Weapons System designed in 1966 in response to the US military's desire for a compact M16 variant to improve on the inadequacies of earlier shortened M16 types.

Although the United States had already tested the CAR-15 Model 607 submachine gun in Vietnam, it had a number of shortcomings, including overwhelming muzzle blast and an overly complicated, unreliable collapsible stock. Colt came up with the XM177, which featured a number of improvements, to address the shortcomings.

The triangular collapsible stock was replaced with a simpler two-position telescoping tubular aluminum buttstock, while the fragile improvised handguards of the Model 607 were replaced by reinforced round handguards. Each half of the round handguard is identical, simplifying logistics by not requiring a top/bottom or left/right pair. The Model 609 Commando has a forward assist, while the Model 610 Commando does not. A Model 610B with a four-position selector was available, but not used by the U.S. military. All versions are equipped with the 4.25-inch (108 mm) long moderator.

Features

    • Full metal receiver and barrel assembly
    • Durable polymer hand guard, stock, and pistol grip
    • A1-style fixed carrying handle with adjustable rear sight
    • Full metal, fully upgradeable Version 2 Gearbox (LDX basic)
    • CAR-15 style stock
    • LDT Hybrid ATM EBBR system bring realistic blow back and recoil

    Manufacturer: LDT/E&C

    Specifications:

    Length: 720mm-805mm, adjustable
    Weight: 2500g
    Inner Barrel: ~270mm
    Thread Direction: 14mm Negative
    Gearbox: LDT Hybrid ATM EBBR
    Motor: Long Type

    Package Includes: Gun, Magazine

    Package Includes: Gun, Magazine

    What is LDT Hybrid ATM EBBR Gearbox:

    Now, we all love the realism of a GBBR, the realistic operational controls, but, we don't like the leaky gas magazines, the cool down and the maintenance burden.

    The ATM gearbox mechanically controls the movement of the bolt carrier to achieve the same stroke as a real gun. ATM should be used in the same sequence of a real gun in order to fire consisting of the following steps: pull back the bolt carrier, check the chamber, advance the bolt carrier forward, and switch the fire select.

    Realistic Electric Blow Black & Recoil: https://youtu.be/ZDaH1tNGsT8?si=IxUHHlASz7KBoief

• Introducing the Guns Modify FN Herstal SCAR L MK2 Gel Blaster GBB Rifle, a collaboration between FN Herstal and Guns Modify, licensed by Cybergun FN Herstal. With a 10-inch 2nd Generation SCAR-L body and enlarged magwell, this rifle offers a non-reciprocating angled charging handle, eliminating the risk of "SCAR bites." Upgrade your gelsoft game with this professional-grade rifle.

 

  • Featuring fully licensed trademarks and engravings from FN and Guns Modify, this rifle utilizes MWS ZET system internals and high-quality Guns Modify internals for superior performance. The proprietary bolt assembly adds to the recoil action, while the monolithic 6061 aluminum housing and polymer lower receiver make for a durable and authentic replica. Compatible with GM MWS AR Gel Blaster GBB mags, this rifle is a must-have for any gelsoft enthusiast.

products.title: Noveske N4 Gel Blaster LDT Hybrid ATM Gearbox Version
products.body_html:
The Noveske N4 NHR (Noveske Hybrid Rifle) is a type of AR-15 rifle, manufactured by Noveske Rifleworks, an American firearms manufacturer. The NHR is a hybrid rifle that combines the best features of the company's other models, such as the N4 Light Recce and N4 Infidel. The NHR features a 14.5-inch barrel with a pinned and welded 3-port brake, a lightweight free-float handguard, and a full-auto bolt carrier group. Additionally, the NHR comes with a Geissele SSA two-stage trigger, Noveske QD end plate and a Magpul CTR stock. The NHR is considered one of the best quality AR-15 rifle in the market and is primarily used by military and law enforcement agencies as well as civilian enthusiasts.

Features

    • Full metal receiver and barrel assembly
    • Durable polymer stock, and pistol grip
    • Noveske marking metal receiver

The Swiss Army P226 is a renowned semi-automatic pistol designed by SIG Sauer. It is widely used by military, law enforcement, and special forces units around the world. The P226 is chambered in 9mm Parabellum, though it is also available in .40 S&W and .357 SIG. Known for its accuracy, durability, and reliability, the P226 has a double/single action system and is equipped with a stainless-steel slide, making it resistant to corrosion. Its ergonomic design, coupled with advanced safety features, has made it a popular choice for military forces, including the Swiss Army.

The Canik TP9 is a Turkish-made semi-automatic pistol introduced in 2009 by Canik Arms, a subsidiary of the Turkish company MKEK. Originally designed for military and law enforcement use, the TP9 became popular in civilian markets due to its affordability, reliability, and performance. It is chambered in 9mm NATO, a widely used caliber known for its balanced performance, providing a good mix of stopping power and manageable recoil. The TP9 features a striker-fired mechanism, with various models offering different configurations such as the TP9 Elite SC and TP9 SFX. Known for its ergonomic design, high capacity magazines, and accuracy, the TP9 is a popular choice among gun enthusiasts and professionals alike.

Improving on the FNP-45 Tactical, developed for the U.S. Joint Combat Pistol Program, the FNX-45 Tactical is the latest in technological advancements in handgun engineering, offering .45 ACP performance and a host of unique features that no other handgun can match. products.title: AW CUSTOM™ - HX1033 Split Frame Hi-Capa GBB Pistol Gel Blaster Replica
products.body_html:
AW Custom strives to provide Gelsofters with high quality guns that come directly from the factory already upgraded. Armorer Works does not simply change the finish of the gun and label it as "custom". Each gun that leaves AW Custom has been modified with enhanced features that truly improve the comfort, performance and efficiency of the gun as well as cosmetic upgrades that are not generally seen in an out of the box gun. Custom finishes, improved grips, sights and ergonomic modifications as well as improved performance and gas efficiency are hallmarks of the dedication AW Custom puts into providing their clients with the highest quality gel blaster products possible.

Features

  • Full metal slide and upper frame w/ front and rear cocking serrations
  • AW Custom nylon fiber reinforced grips; Stippled and radiused grips improve shooters grip and comfort
  • Fiber optic front and rear sight improve targeting ability in low light situations
  • Short stroke recoil spring improves cyclic rate
  • Enhanced magwell facilitates reloading
  • Frame mounted accessory rail
  • Skeletonized trigger and hammer

products.title: TTI™ / EMG - 2011 COMBAT MASTER Alpha GBB GEL BLASTER REPLICA (FULL AUTO)
products.body_html:
Features

  • This is the official licensed version authorized by TTI with full after-sales support. Every sale of this pistol benefits the original designer. Support licensed products and better products!
  • Highly detailed CNC machined aluminum slide w/ officially licensed TTI laser engraved markings
  • CNC machined aluminum frame w/ molded reinforced polymer grips & lower 1913 Picatinny rails
  • Optic mounting plate supports RMR-pattern red dot sights for faster, easier aiming
  • Mounting plate cover lets you protect the threads & mounting posts when not in use
  • Precision CNC aluminum 5" outer barrel w/ rose gold (imitation Bronze BLC) coating & two port compensator
  • TTI professional slide lightening cuts help the slide cycle faster with less felt muzzle flip
  • Flared mag well aids in quick reloads

Taran Tactical Innovations is a name synonymous with ultra high performance gun customization and competition inspired accessories. Taran Butler, the founder of Taran Tactical Innovations is a world renown shooter that has more championship titles across a myriad of competitions than anyone else. An expert with pistols, rifles, and shotguns, Taran Butler holds the title of Grandmaster in both pistol and multi-gun, which further highlights his pedigree in the shooting sports. His expertise as a competitive shooter and as a trainer has given him the insight to spotting crucial areas of improvement for each weapon platform he chooses to run. Each cut, each part tuned, each enhancement made is done with the utmost care and precision with the ultimate goal of becoming faster, more consistent, and more accurate. The miliseconds he buys you on the gun translates to being miles ahead of the competition.

EMG is proud to announce our next collaboration project with TTI to bring highly detailed, high quality training variants of their handguns to Airsoft; we will be working very closely with both companies to ensure this is the most accurate to the real-life counterpart as possible. These handguns are exceptionally crafted to tight tolerances to mimic the look and feel to that of their real life counterparts. Expert technicians pay close attention to details in tuning to make sure the training replica feels as good and is crisp to shoot like the real thing. The trigger is ultra light and fast which compliments well to the quick cycling slide.

Dimensions: 270mm x 150mm
Gas Type: Green Gas 
Firing Mode: Semi Automatic/Full Auto, Safety
System: Gas Blowback
Package Includes: Gun, Magazine, Optics Plate Cover (Red Dot Sight not included)

Each cut, each part tuned, each enhancement made is done with the utmost care and precision with the ultimate goal of becoming faster, more consistent, and more accurate. The real Sand Viper was designed to be the ultimate 2-gun / 3-gun competition pistol. It has proven itself as already the sickest serpent on the planet, holding the overall win at the USPSA 2-Gun Nationals. The airsoft replica follows its cues and puts together a pistol ready to take on even the most fierce of opponents. products.title: E&C XM177E2 with M203 Gel Blaster LDT Hybrid ATM Gearbox Version
products.body_html:
The CAR-15 XM177 or CAR-15 Commando was a part of the CAR-15 Military Weapons System designed in 1966 in response to the US military's desire for a compact M16 variant to improve on the inadequacies of earlier shortened M16 types.

Although the United States had already tested the CAR-15 Model 607 submachine gun in Vietnam, it had a number of shortcomings, including overwhelming muzzle blast and an overly complicated, unreliable collapsible stock. Colt came up with the XM177, which featured a number of improvements, to address the shortcomings.

The triangular collapsible stock was replaced with a simpler two-position telescoping tubular aluminum buttstock, while the fragile improvised handguards of the Model 607 were replaced by reinforced round handguards. Each half of the round handguard is identical, simplifying logistics by not requiring a top/bottom or left/right pair. The Model 609 Commando has a forward assist, while the Model 610 Commando does not. A Model 610B with a four-position selector was available, but not used by the U.S. military. All versions are equipped with the 4.25-inch (108 mm) long moderator.

Features

    • Full metal receiver and barrel assembly
    • Durable polymer hand guard, stock, and pistol grip
    • CAR-15 style stock
    • LDT hybrid ATM gearbox
    • M203 Grenade launcher long barrel version

the Noveske N4 NHR (Noveske Hybrid Rifle) is a type of AR-15 rifle, manufactured by Noveske Rifleworks, an American firearms manufacturer. The NHR is a hybrid rifle that combines the best features of the company's other models, such as the N4 Light Recce and N4 Infidel. The NHR features a 14.5-inch barrel with a pinned and welded 3-port brake, a lightweight free-float handguard, and a full-auto bolt carrier group. Additionally, the NHR comes with a Geissele SSA two-stage trigger, Noveske QD end plate and a Magpul CTR stock. The NHR is considered one of the best quality AR-15 rifle in the market and is primarily used by military and law enforcement agencies as well as civilian enthusiasts.

products.title: LDT CTR Style Stock (High Fidelity Version) Mil-Spec
products.body_html:
The CTR style stock is a drop-in replacement buttstock for M4 carbines using mil-spec sized receiver extension tubes. Designed for light, fast action the streamlined A-frame profile avoids snagging and shields the release latch to prevent accidental activation.

It’s also features a supplemental friction lock system that minimizes excessive stock movement for enhanced blaster stability and an ambidextrous QD sling mount that will accept any push-button sling swivel. It has a thick rubber butt-pad which provides positive shoulder purchase to prevent slippage even with body armor or modular gear.

products.title: Cybergun FN Herstal-Licensed SCAR-SC Compact AEG Gel Blaster REPLICA
products.body_html:
Licensed gel blaster replica of the well-known Belgian subcompact carbine FN SCAR-SC, produced by Fabrique Nationale de Herstal. The SCAR-SC is one of the most recognizable and iconic firearm models manufactured by FN Herstal. Its distinctive design and compact size make it ideal for use by special forces and counter-terrorism units in hostage rescue operations and Close-quarters combat (CQC).

The CYMA replica of the SCAR-SC, licensed by CYBERGUN, is an exact reproduction of the original model. The collaboration between these two companies has resulted in a licensed model that offers good-quality craftsmanship at an affordable price. This allows both gel blaster enthusiasts and collectors to enjoy owning this renowned replica, whether they engage in gelsoft sports or simply appreciate unique replicas.

Similar to the original SCAR, the replica is primarily made of aluminium and polymer. The upper receiver, barrel, stock, rail systems, and other smaller components are made of aluminium and other metal alloys, while the lower receiver, pistol grip, and stock pad are made of polymer, just like the real thing. The FN SCAR CQC rifle was designed as an ambidextrous weapon to meet the requirements of special forces and provide reliability and mobility during military operations. The gel blaster SCAR-SC follows suit, featuring an ambidextrous fire selector lever, an ambi magazine release, sling attachment points, and a reversible charging handle. 

Features

  • Fully licensed replica of the FN Herstal SCAR-SC Compact PDW
  • High quality full metal upper receiver and polymer lower receiver, just like the real rifle
  • Mag priming function available when pull charging handle
  • Compared to its bigger brothers, the compact PDW size of the SCAR-SC makes it a perfect option for CQB, vehicle ops, or any other situation where you need as small as rifle as possible
  • Ambidextrous 3-position selectors and magazine releases are easy to use both right- and left-handed
  • Monolithic 12 o'clock rail and additional rails at 3, 6, and 9 o'clock positions for attaching optics, grips, lights, lasers, and other standard 20mm RIS accessories
  • Special 3-position adjustable PDW stock collapses down far further than a standard buffer tube stock and features a wide rubberized buttpad for comfort
  • Functioning mock bolt lock
  • Sling mount rings built into the upper receiver on both sides
  • Includes flip-up front and rear iron sights

Manufacturer: Cybergun / CYMA (Licensed by FN Herstal)

FPS Range: 280-300

Specifications:

Length: 535mm - 650mm (Adjustable)
Weight: 3280g
Thread Direction: 14mm Negative (CCW)
Gearbox: Ver 2 Full Metal, Fully Upgradeable
Motor: 480 Long
Fire Modes: Semi/Full-Auto, Safety
Electric Blowback: No
Battery: 7.4v Small Type LiPo Recommended (Wired To Rear w/ Standard mini Tamiya Connector). Battery Not Included.

products.title: Evolution Gear CNC Convex Engraving Trijicon SRO Red Dot Sight Gen2
products.body_html:
• Compatible with all gel blaster with 0.8 inch (20 mm) rails 
  • With SRO Gen.2, the Trisicon engraving on the left and right side of the lens has been upgraded to the same 3D engraving. The welding marks on the top of the lens are also recreated, making it one of the top SRO replicas available
  • Introducing the Gen.2 replica of Evolution Gear Trisicon Sight that is compact yet easy to aim with large lenses
  • In the previous version, when the reticle reached the edges of the lens, it has been improved with the Gen.2 to show round reticle at any position of the lens. The luminous unit itself is also updated, and the reticle is bright enough for a replica of the open dot site
  • Adopts a large 1.0 inch (25 mm) diameter lens, with a much wider field of view while being compact and difficult to lose sight of reticles. Recommended as a main primary optics and backup site for magnification scopes.

products.title: Evolution Gear T2/RMR Offsets Rail Mount
products.body_html:
Offset Optic Mount is a modular mounting solution that allows the user to select a 35 or 45 degree offset position for their red dot sight without additional components.

The 35 degree position brings the red dot sight up closer to slimmer, smaller scopes,
while the 45 degree position provides additional clearance around wider turrets.

The mount is set to 35 or 45 degrees by reversing the stem between the optic plate and base during assembly. 

The mount's unique geometry correctly aligns the optic vertically over the bore and maintains a consistent height at both 35 and 45 degrees.

products.title: ARISAKA Torch Mount M-Lok
products.body_html:
Description

The ARISAKA Torch Mount is designed for use with Surefire Scout Lights, the Modlite PLH and OKW weapon lights, the Arisaka 300, 600 and 18650 Series, the Streamlight Protac Rail Mount lights, and the Olight Odin. It replaces the stock Picatinny rail adapter with a low profile mount for M-Lok handguards, and tucks the light underneath either side of the ATPIAL laser/illuminator series, including the ATPIAL-C, AN/PEQ15, and LA-5/PEQ. It will also allow the light to clear an NGAL and the QD lever on the Steiner DBAL I2, A3, and D2.

Compatible with the Modlite PLH, PLHv2 and OKW, Surefire M300A, M300B, M300C, M300V, M312, M322, M312V, M313V, M322V, M600B, M600C, M600P, M600U, M600V, M600DF, M612, M622, M603V, M612V, M622V, Streamlight Protac Rail Mount 1, 2 and HL-X (non-laser), Olight Odin, CD REIN, and Arisaka 300, 600 and 18650 Series.

As a bonus, the Side Scout Mount also works nicely on the Sig MPX PCC and MCX Virtus M-Lok handguards.

Length: 1.265"

Thickness: 0.2"

Weight: 0.6 oz

The mount is CNC machined from 6061-T651 aluminum and MIL-A-8625 Type III hard coat anodized. Includes necessary screws to attach light body to mount. Requires an IP20 TorxPlus driver for installation (not included). A T9 Torx driver is required to remove the stock Picatinny mount from Surefire Scout Lights. Recommended torque: 30 inch lbs for M-Lok screws and 20 inch lbs for light body screws with medium strength threadlocker.

Hardware: Two M-Lok nuts, two 10-24x5/16" Torx button head screws, two 8-32x5/16" Torx flat head screws.

products.title: Solink-Brushless Motor SX-1 Gen4 (BLUE LONG 34000RPM)

Solink did mention that this motor when paired with 18:1 gears and an M120 spring, the AEG could do 30 rounds per second!

Solink Technology, renowned for its expertise in AEG motors, serves as the original equipment manufacturer for several leading brands including VFC, SHS, G&G, and ARES, owing to the durability and performance potential of their motors, making them an excellent choice for upgrading or replacing motors.

products.title: POSTAGE
A&K Cybergun FN Licensed SP SYSTEM MK46 MOD0 GEL BLASTER REPLICA LMG AEG BATTLEWORN VERSION
products.body_html:
The MK46 is a variant of the base M249 or Minimi seen and used by many militaries around the world. The MK46 in particular is a variant used by the United States military forces and can easily be differentiated from the baseline M249. The two key differences are the addition of Picatinny rails on the upper receiver for the mounting of optics and the railed handguard up front.

This MK46 replica is T8's attempt to modernize the aging A&K MK46 machine gun gel blaster. Externally, other than the nice and authentic battle-worn finish, this machine gun gel blaster carries all the nice bits from the original A&K MK46, featuring a quick detach barrel and adjustable rear sights with Picatinny railed top cover, and handguard for accessories. The lower receiver has been updated to be of CNC construction and the buffer tube is of M4 / AR15 spec with a stock that is made for M4 / AR 15 giving it arguably better ergonomics.

Internally, this machine gun has an updated gearbox with a high-torque motor and CNC gear set, 8mm bearings, a piston with steel teeth, and also a quick detachable spring system allowing for quick spring change for different FPS, allowing users to tune this  machine gun gel blaster to your favorite field's requirements with ease.

Includes:

  • x1 T8 X A&K SP System MK46 MOD0 LMG AEG Battleworn Version gel blaster - BK
  • x1 Drum Magazine
  • x1 Fore Grip
  • FN gun case

About A&K

A&K has been in business for more than a decade, boasting a huge selection of popular rifle models as well as unique platforms; Machine Guns, SMGs, DMRs, and even WWII replicas. A&K provides a great lineup of Airsoft products at a great value.

products.title: Daniel Defense MFR Handguard
products.body_html: The MFR Rail Systems from Daniel Defense utilize the M-LOK attachment system for incredible weight savings as well as superior cooling, ergonomics, and modularity while maintaining the strength and durability expected from Daniel Defense. M-LOK attachment points are located along 7 positions on the rail and feature an uninterrupted 1913 Picatinny rail on top. Ambidextrous sling swivel attachment points are integrated into both the left and right side rails. Its sleek bolt-up system increases strength and reduces the overall diameter of the rail making it easier to control, all while utilizing our Bolt-up System barrel nut. Anti-rotation tabs come standard for ease of installation and alignment. The MFR can be used with a pinned low-profile gas block on pistol, carbine, mid-length or rifle length gas systems.

products.title: LDT ATM GEARBOX
products.body_html:
Now, we all love the realism of a GBBR, the realistic operational controls, but, we don't like the leaky gas magazines, the cool down and the maintenance burden.

The ATM gearbox mechanically controls the movement of the bolt carrier to achieve the same stroke as a real gun. ATM should be used in the same sequence of a real gun in order to fire consisting of the following steps: pull back the bolt carrier, check the chamber, advance the bolt carrier forward, and switch the fire select.

Features

  • New and revolutionary gearbox
  • Operates like a GBBR
  • Uses AEG magazine
  • Real recoil
  • All the bonuses of a GBBR with none of the downsides
  • 11.1V battery
  • Perfect for LDT receivers

Installation Notes

  • Damage caused due to incorrect and failed installation is not covered under warranty. We highly recommend getting this installed by an experienced technician.

products.title: Full Metal QD Dead Air Sandman-K Suppressor Replica with Steel KeyMo Muzzle for Gel Blaster
products.body_html:
Give your gel blaster a pro-level silhouette with the Full-Metal QD Dead Air Sandman-K Suppressor Replica with Steel KeyMo Muzzle. Engineered for aesthetics, durability, and easy installation, this replica silencer delivers a heavy, realistic feel and rock-solid QD mounting via a steel KeyMo interface — ideal for collectors, skirmish players, and movie-style builds.

Constructed from full metal and finished in matte black, the Sandman-K replica is built to withstand field use while maintaining its sleek tactical look. The steel KeyMo muzzle adapter provides a secure connection to KeyMo-style mounts and ensures reliable alignment and repeatable zero when attaching or detaching the suppressor. The quick-detach (QD) mechanism makes swapping optics or changing barrel length fast and hassle-free.

Key Features

  • Full-metal construction for authentic weight and durability

  • Quick-Detach (QD) design for fast on/off use

  • Steel KeyMo muzzle adapter for secure mount compatibility

  • Matte black tactical finish — low glare, pro look

  • Designed specifically as a replica for gel blasters, and display

  • Repeatable mounting for consistent alignment

  • AU stocked — fast domestic shipping and support

pecifications (please confirm with your supplier/inventory)

  • Material: Full metal body, steel KeyMo muzzle adapter

  • Overall Length: 5.4 inches

  • Mount Type: KeyMo-style QD (steel adapter)

  • Finish: Matte Black / Hardcoat Anodised (as stocked)

  • Compatibility: KeyMo style mounts / KeyMod-compatible flash hiders on gel blasters (-14mm)

This is a non-functional, replica suppressor intended solely for gel blasters, display, cosplay, and lawful recreational use. It is not suitable for real firearms.

The Noveske N4 NHR (Noveske Hybrid Rifle) is a type of AR-15 rifle, manufactured by Noveske Rifleworks, an American firearms manufacturer. The NHR is a hybrid rifle that combines the best features of the company's other models, such as the N4 Light Recce and N4 Infidel. The NHR features a 14.5-inch barrel with a pinned and welded 3-port brake, a lightweight free-float handguard, and a full-auto bolt carrier group. The NHR is considered one of the best quality AR-15 rifle in the market and is primarily used by military and law enforcement agencies as well as civilian enthusiasts.

products.title: E&C Glock 19X Gas Blowback Pistol TAN Gel Blaster REPLICA
products.body_html:
Welcome to the world of gel blasting excitement with the E&C Glock 19x Gel Blaster Pistol! If you’re looking for an authentic, high-performance gel blaster that offers precision shooting and a realistic experience, you’ve come to the right place. In this listing, we’ll dive into the features, benefits, and all the reasons why the E&C Glock 19x is a must-have for gel blaster enthusiasts.

E&C Glock 19x Gas Blowback Gel Blaster Pistol Highlights:

  1. Unmatched Realism: The E&C Glock 19x Gel Blaster Pistol is designed to mimic the real Glock 19x, providing an unparalleled sense of authenticity. From its weight and feel to its functional controls, you’ll feel like you’re holding the genuine firearm.
  2. Precision Shooting: This gel blaster delivers exceptional accuracy, making it perfect for competitive battles or target practice.
  3. Durable Construction: Crafted from robust materials, the E&C Glock 19x is built to withstand the rigors of intense gel blasting action. It’s designed to be reliable, ensuring that it will be your trusty companion during countless skirmishes.
  4. Designed specifically for Gel Balls: The E&C Glock 19x is compatible with standard gel blaster gel balls, providing an affordable and easy-to-find ammunition source for your adventures, which is non-toxic and biodegradable.
  5. Easy to Use: Whether you’re a seasoned gel blaster pro or a beginner, you’ll appreciate the user-friendly design of this pistol. It’s easy to load, shoot, and maintain.

Why Choose the E&C Glock 19x Gel Blaster Pistol?

  • Quality Assurance: E&C is known for its commitment to quality and performance, ensuring that you get the best value for your investment.
  • Immersive Gameplay: Experience gel blasting like never before with a blaster that closely resembles the real thing, enhancing your overall gaming experience.
  • Great for Collectors: This gel blaster is also a fantastic addition to any collection of firearm replicas or gel blasters.

Get Ready for Gel Blasting Adventures: Whether you’re a gel blasting enthusiast or someone looking to try it for the first time, the E&C Glock 19x Gel Blaster Pistol is the perfect choice. Get your hands on one today and step into a world of thrilling and safe gel blasting action.

E&C Glock 19x Gel Blaster Pistol Features:

  • FULL METAL SLIDE
  • Fully Glock Licensed slide engraved with markings
  • Rail Framed can take any tactical flashlight & laser red dot pointer.
  • Come with Three Different size interchangeable selective back straps (Small, Medium and Large)

products.title: E&C XM177E2 WITH M203 MACVSOG RIFLE EC-704 Gel Blaster Replica (Ultra LDX Version)
products.body_html:
The CAR-15 XM177 or CAR-15 Commando was a part of the CAR-15 Military Weapons System designed in 1966 in response to the US military's desire for a compact M16 variant to improve on the inadequacies of earlier shortened M16 types.

Although the United States had already tested the CAR-15 Model 607 submachine gun in Vietnam, it had a number of shortcomings, including overwhelming muzzle blast and an overly complicated, unreliable collapsible stock. Colt came up with the XM177, which featured a number of improvements, to address the shortcomings.

The triangular collapsible stock was replaced with a simpler two-position telescoping tubular aluminum buttstock, while the fragile improvised handguards of the Model 607 were replaced by reinforced round handguards. Each half of the round handguard is identical, simplifying logistics by not requiring a top/bottom or left/right pair. The Model 609 Commando has a forward assist, while the Model 610 Commando does not. A Model 610B with a four-position selector was available, but not used by the U.S. military. All versions are equipped with the 4.25-inch (108 mm) long moderator.

Features

    • Full metal receiver and barrel assembly
    • Durable polymer hand guard, stock, and pistol grip
    • A1-style fixed carrying handle with adjustable rear sight
    • LDX basic gearbox
    • M203 grenade launcher

products.title: E&C XM177 COMMANDO MACVSOG RIFLE BLACK EC-324 Gel Blaster Replica
products.body_html:
The CAR-15 XM177 or CAR-15 Commando was a part of the CAR-15 Military Weapons System designed in 1966 in response to the US military's desire for a compact M16 variant to improve on the inadequacies of earlier shortened M16 types.

Although the United States had already tested the CAR-15 Model 607 submachine gun in Vietnam, it had a number of shortcomings, including overwhelming muzzle blast and an overly complicated, unreliable collapsible stock. Colt came up with the XM177, which featured a number of improvements, to address the shortcomings.

The triangular collapsible stock was replaced with a simpler two-position telescoping tubular aluminum buttstock, while the fragile improvised handguards of the Model 607 were replaced by reinforced round handguards. Each half of the round handguard is identical, simplifying logistics by not requiring a top/bottom or left/right pair. The Model 609 Commando has a forward assist, while the Model 610 Commando does not. A Model 610B with a four-position selector was available, but not used by the U.S. military. All versions are equipped with the 4.25-inch (108 mm) long moderator.

Features

  • Full metal receiver and barrel assembly
  • Durable polymer hand guard, stock, and pistol grip
  • A1-style fixed carrying handle with adjustable rear sight
  • Full metal, fully upgradeable Version 2 Gearbox (E&C Gearbox)
  • CAR-15 style stock

Manufacturer: E&C

Specifications:

Length: 720mm-805mm, adjustable
Weight: 2500g
Inner Barrel: ~270mm
Thread Direction: 14mm Negative
Gearbox:  E&C Gearbox
Motor: Long Type
Fire Modes: Semi/Full-Auto, Safety
Package Includes: Gun, Magazine
Materials: Metal alloy, polymer

DISCLAIMER
Please do not upgrade any part of your toy gel blaster as this will void the warranty. Modifications include disassembling or opening the blaster, altering springs, or changing the battery from 7.4v to 11.v.

products.title: TMC ELS Belt ( Multicam )
products.body_html:
The TMC Modular Eclipse Belt is an ultra-lightweight, next-generation rigid micro battle belt with modular buckle type and location. Due to its advanced construction techniques and materials, it is under 5 ounces unloaded. The TMC Modular Eclipse Belt is 1.9" tall and will fit through the belt loops of combat pants and similar pants if desired. The TMC Modular Eclipse Belt comes with Austrialpin 1" Cobra buckles which is high strength and solid quality. The position of the running end of the buckle is changeable along the belt, allowing 1.5" gross sizing adjustments. This allows the user to size their belt down significantly for seasonal clothing changes. The inherent negative space of the TMC Modular Eclipse Belt allows new and advanced attachment hardware designs while maintaining compatibility with traditional MOLLE pouches as well as MOLLE clips.

Key Features

  • Material: Made of high quality 500D composite fabric

  • Ultra lightweight and modular design

  • Tegris supporting structure

  • Laser cut process

  • Fit through the belt loops of combat pants and similar pants

  • Comes with Austrialpin 1" Cobra buckles

  • M size fit 70-82cm waist

  • L size fit 82-90cm waist

  • Dimensions (cm): 35 (L)x 8 (W) x 6 (H)

  • Weight (gram): 300

  • Package includes: Belt x 1

products.title: TMC FERRO BS Belt
products.body_html:
To provide optimal gear stabilization, we utilized a single layer of laser-cut thermoplastic as the framework. This technology reduces overall weight and thickness drastically but retains better rigidity than traditional methods. Integrated through the entire core of the belt is continuous 1inch tubular webbing from buckle to buckle for strength. Lightweight webbing was selected for reduced overall bulk and ease of installing Molle compatible products. For reliable fastening, the TMC Lightweight Blaster Belt System is equipped with a tried and true D-Ring Cobra buckle. The inside of the belt is lined with hook Velcro for quick and secure don/doff capability with the included inner pant belt which completes the TMC Lightweight Blaster Belt System.

Key Features

  • Low profile and lightweight

  • Molle compatible

  • Not reflect under IR light and NOD

  • Hook and loop attachment system

  • 2inch height outer belt, 1.5inch height inner belt

  • D-ring Cobra buckle

  • Dimensions (cm): 30 (L)x 10 (W) x 7 (H)

  • Weight (gram): 300

  • Package includes: Belt x 1

products.title: TMC SP Marker Light Personal Identification LED
products.body_html:
TMC Lightweight Smart Marker Light is a tiny personal identification and marking light with a big personality. Originally designed for the safety of workers on oil platforms, TMC Lightweight Smart Marker Light is a practically unnoticeable addition to helmets, plate carriers, or chest rigs. TMC Lightweight Smart Marker Light is easily activated by pressing its center. It is cycled on or off by pressing it again. A positive click can be felt when the light is not placed in a spot visible to the user. TMC Lightweight Smart Marker Light is fully encapsulated, making it water resistant in a flexible silicon body. The LED will blink when activated. TMC Lightweight Smart Marker Light is backed with hook panel for ready placement on tactical and industrial gear.

Key Features

  • Material: Made of high quality silicon
  • Lightweight and low profile design
  • Water resistant

products.title: TMC Drop Pouch for MCR TMC3117
products.body_html:
This TMC Sub Abdominal GP Pouch is made of high quality Cordura fabric. The TMC Sub Abdominal GP Pouch is the most versatile tactical "fanny pack" on the market. It was designed to give critical equipment easy to access from both sides or when in a confined space like a vehicle. The pouch features a half zip design, which means that your equipment will not easily fall out of the pouch even if the zipper is left unsecured. The front of the pouch features a small zippered stash pocket that is constructed using a durable 4 way stretch material and is perfect for easy access to small items. The stretch material keeps those items snug and in place. The bottom of the pouch features two elastic loops that can be adjusted to hold a tourniquet or other equipment that you may need to rapidly deploy. If bottom carry doesn't fit your mission needs, you can easily remove and reinstall the loops as necessary. The inside features soft loop platform on both sides. This makes the pouch very dynamic, giving you the ability to use our hook insert suite to fit your requirements. It also features two slide-locks that make it easy to adjust the tension of the elastic loops hanging below, as well as two tie-down loops for securing sensitive equipment. The two grommet holes on the bottom aid with drainage of the pouch, if submersion occurs.

Key Features

  • Material: Made of high quality Cordura material
  • The most versatile tactical "fanny pack" on the market
  • Designed to give critical equipment easy to access from both sides
  • Features a half zip and two slide-locks design
  • Dimensions (cm): 23 (L) x 14 (W) x 4 (H)
  • Weight (gram): 200
  • Package includes: GP Pouch x 1

Uses high quality foam protection to provide lower face protection from Gel Balls, rough terrain landings, and debris encountered during off-road vehicle missions. Its flexible frame allows a close stock weld, and results in minimum interference when sighting shoulder-fired weapons. Folds conveniently to fit into rucksack or other storage, quick tool-less attachment to the helmet side rails.

 

  • Compatible with Maritime and High Cut Helmets

  • Uses two high quality foam protection

  • Flexible frame allows a close stock weld, and results in minimum interference when sighting shoulder-fired weapons

  • Folds conveniently to fit into rucksack or other storage

  • Quick and tool-less attachment to the helmet side rails

  • One size fits all

  • Dimensions (cm): 28 (L) x 16 (W) x 11 (H)

It fastens to the plate carrier with the buckles at the top of the panel and the carrier and has pull tabs on the bottom to release the panel and switch with others between loadouts. These are great for swapping with other back panels due to the easy velcro fastening and double buckles.

products.title: SAI INNOVATIONS™ / EMG -BLU TIER ONE COMPETITION GEL BLASTER REPLICA GOLD & BLACK
products.body_html:
FEATURES

  • Lightweight, rugged injection molded polymer frame, with interchangeable backstraps and "stippled" texture for positive grip surface, designed off of the original SAI specifications for optimized ergonomics
  • Frame integrated 20mm accessory rail is ideal for mounting weapon lights and other accessories
  • Fiber optic front sight and SAI rear sight, designed specifically for single handed manipulation (compatible with all TM spec sights)
  • SAI brass color removable backstrap and magazine release for added weight to enhance balance while shooting
  • Precision CNC machined, weather-resistant black anodized finish aluminum alloy slide with licensed deep engraved SAI logos and trademarks
  • Slide lightening cuts and facets provide an overall improved recycle rate
  • Steel front and rear sights; front sight includes fiber optic rod
  • Threaded, fluted SAI style outer barrel with gold finish to emulate the real SAI TiN coating

Designed, manufactured and marketed, entirely in house by Salient Arms, the SAI BLU is the first production handgun from SAI. Using feedback from real world users, Salient Arms developed the SAI BLU to fill the void between M&P ergonomics and Glock reliability. With aggressive cocking serrations, ergonomically designed grip and trigger guard and interchangeable backstraps the SAI BLU is designed to perform under the most rigorous and austere of conditions, no matter what the shooter requires of it.

The Salient Arms International Tier One line of lides from EMG are a great way to give your SAI BLU a unique and aggressive look! Not only do they look cool, they also preserve the performance of your EMG SAI BLU. Each slide is CNC machined from aluminum, preserving that crisp, snappy blowback action from the original BLU slide. All slides feature deep-engraved SAI trademarks. The gold barrel features deep-engraved SAI trademarks, along with internal threading for use with compatible threaded adapters. Gold barrels are coated in a TiN color finish, giving them an authentic, realistic look.

While the world around us has moved to less demanding production techniques, AW Custom has stayed true to its original values based on craftsmanship and quality, that is why AW Custom products are able to last a lifetime. products.title: Switch M-Lok Mount Plates
products.body_html:
• 【Widely Used】 This tactical tape switch mount is cleverly designed and the length of applicable switch is not limited. It can be used with pressure switch pad of different products. Such as DBAL-A2/M300/M600 series pressure switches.(Note: Switch not included)
  • 【Suitability & Stability】 The remote switch mount plate fits for Mlok / Keymod rail. It can fix your scout light switch firmly to the rail during use, which looks more tactical and tidy.
  • 【Lightweight & Durable】 Made of aircraft grade aluminum alloy, hard-coated anodized for superior durability and wear resistance. It's lightweight and compact, doesn's add too much useless weight and bulk when hunting.
  • 【Easy to Install】 The pressure switch mount is ergonomically designed with rounded corners. Snagging free design ensures comfort and sturdy performance.Equipped with wrench for easy installation and removal.
  • 【Package Includes】 The remote tape switch mount kit includes 2 metal mount components, 2 fixing screws, 2 nuts for Mlok & Keymod rail and 1 allen wrench.

Material: Alluminum

products.title: Kar98K Bolt
King Arms M1A1 Paratrooper Gel Blaster REPLICA GBBR
products.body_html:
Features

  • Authentic real stained wood stock
  • Side folding wire stock with folding metal buttplate
  • CO2 powered action provides you with plenty of power out on the field
  • Front and rear sling swivels
  • Realistic blowback action
  • Adjustable rear sight
  • Authentic steel-like finish
  • CNC One piece outer barrel

Developed out of a need to arm specialized infantry (mortar crews, paratroopers, machine gun crews, tank crews, engineersetc) the M1 Carbine came into service around mid-1942 and was issued up to and including the Vietnam war. Its design was to solve an issue where a standard full size rifle proved to be too heavy and unwieldy for specialized infantry to adequately perform their assigned duty while still lugging around a heavy backup weapon. The M1 Carbine with is .30 cartridge helps to bridge the gap between a full size rifle round and pistol round.

The King Arms M1A1 Paratrooper replica is a beautiful reproduction of this classic firearm. Made with real wood and aluminum alloy, the rifle looks and feels authentic. Adding to the realism is a Co2 powered gas recoil system which helps to imitate the bolt cycling action.

Specifications:

Length: 635mm/920mm
Weight: 2480g
Magazine Capacity: 15rds
Fire Modes: Semi-Automatic, Safe
Package Includes: Gun, Magazine
FPS: 350

About King Arms

King Arms was founded in 2004 with the mission to ensure optimum customer satisfaction by providing precision products and outstanding service. In 2015, we moved our headquarters from Hong Kong to Taiwan where we've continued to provide excellent products with the highest quality. While working with leading firearms manufactures, we provide to our customers a level of innovation and authenticity that can't be found anywhere else in the Airsoft and Gelsoft industry. This goal is what continuously drives us to improve and gives us purpose.

products.title: TWS 9mm SBR GBB Gel Blaster REPLICA BK
products.body_html:
1.M-LOK tactical handguard：
 - M-LOK is the most trendy rail system in the real firearms. This handguard is KING ARMS original design. the M-LOK specification done according to MAGPUL provided document.
 - One piece CNC machined metal M-LOK handguard provides a solid rail platform. M-LOK-standard accessories can be bolt-on quickly and concretely.
 - Stylish engraved handguard provides unique outlook and light weight.
 - Four-sided mounting platform conveniences shooters to bolt-on vary accessories.

 

2.Outer & Inner Barrel：
 - Metal outer barrel and delta ring mount to avoid wobbling.
 - Well-polished precise 7mm brass inner barrel lets every shot more accurate.

 

3.Rifle body：
 - Metal bolt catch, selector lever, trigger make the gel blaster more durable.

 

4.Reinforced Parts : 
 - Full steel upgraded parts (KA-PT-26) to provide high durability : Trigger, Selector Lever, Hammer, Sear.

 

5.Bolt carrier :
 - High speed bolt carrier
 - Reinforced Steel bolt-stop parts installed

 

5.Non-slip grip：
 - Rough surface design can prevent slip of griping. You can grasp full control of your rifle confidently.
- Ergonomic designed offers the operator maximum comfort and control over the rifle.

 

6.Sights：
 - Metal front sight and rear sight . Both of them are rail mounting and able to flip-up. They have adjustable aiming pins and range finder hole to fit corresponding difference field-shooting environment.

 

7.Magazine：
 - Magazine capacity : need to be testified 
 - Compatible with : Need to be testified 

 

8.Tactical stock：
- Provides comfortable, secure shoulder rest for Gel blaster
- Easy to install and ergonomic design let shooter grip their gel blaster confidently. 
- Nylon Fibre material provide anti-shock while shooting.
- Can be locked down to virtually eliminate movement in the stock.
- Can be quickly converted to fit commercial or Mil-Spec buffer tubes.
- Sling loop and quick-detach mounting point provided for wide variety of  harness /Sling options.
- Mounting points at the bottom of stock that can install QD Sling Swivel.

9.Flash Hider :
 - Steel Black Rain Ordnance HEXAGONAL COMPETITION COMPENSATOR
